name: comunicator
description: The 720kb notifier api (atm it uses websockets)

scripts.js-min: ./tasks/banner | xargs -0 -I banner uglifyjs src/js/comunicator.js --preamble banner -c -m --screw-ie8 -p relative --source-map dist/comunicator.min.js.map -o dist/comunicator.min.js
scripts.ng-min: ./tasks/banner | xargs -0 -I banner uglifyjs src/js/comunicator.js src/angular/comunicator.js --preamble banner -c -m --screw-ie8 -p relative --source-map dist/comunicator-angular.min.js.map -o dist/comunicator-angular.min.js
scripts.min: npm run-script js-min && npm run-script ng-min && plato -r -d report -l .jshintrc -t "comunicator" src/
scripts.lint: eslint -c .eslintrc src && jshint -c .jshintrc --reporter=unix src && jscs -c .jscsrc src
